description: young man dressed as a woman in a blue kimono with white iris decoration lying on top of and engaged in intercourse with a man wearing a green kimono; tiny man wearing a black kimono and holding a fan, with a large white and red kite, on windowsill; text in cloud at top of image, above couple and on either side of small figure on windowsill
marks:
Inscription

in cloud: [まねへもん　やりくり島にて夫婦<みやうと>のいざ
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Playing with a Dandy, No. 5 from the book Elegant Erotic Mane'emon (Fūryū enshoku Mane'emon), vol. 1
